name: Just a little logo change!
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);  @-moz-document url-prefix(http://www.google.) {   img[src$="/images/logo.gif"] {     width: 0 !important;     height: 0px !important;     padding-left: 400px !important;     background-image: url(http://funnylogo.info/logo/Yahoo/Red/iLink.aspx) !important;     background-position: center left !important;     background-repeat: no-repeat !important;   }    div[title="Google"] {     background-image: url(http://dailycontributor.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/11/cookie_monster-doodle.gif) !important;     background-position: bottom center !important;     background-repeat: no-repeat !important;     padding-top: 0px !important;     width: 303px !important;     height: 120px !important;   }    div[title="Google"] > div {     left: 210px !important;     top: 95px !important;     opacity: 0 !important;   } }     @-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.google.com") {    img[src$="/images/srpr/logo1w.png"]{   width: 0px !important;   background-image: url(http://funnylogo.info/logo/Yahoo/Red/iLink.aspx)!important;   background-position: bottom left !important;   padding-left: 303px !important;   padding-top: 159px !important;   background-repeat: no-repeat;    } }
